alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 2:43PM CDT until May 26 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo affecting Tulsa County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek at Avant affecting Osage County. Bird Creek near Sperry affecting Osage and Tulsa Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo. * WHEN...From late tonight to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, minor flooding occurs near Mohawk Park. 56th Street North may be impassable near Mingo Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 19.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
